qa_list.question: about college
qa_list.answer: Kanchrapara College, established in 1972, is a well-known undergraduate college located in Kanchrapara, West Bengal, India. It offers courses in Arts, Science, and Commerce streams.

qa_list.question: courses offered
qa_list.answer: The college offers undergraduate courses in Science (B.Sc.), Arts (B.A.), and Commerce (B.Com). Popular subjects include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English, History, Accountancy, and Economics.

qa_list.question: admission process
qa_list.answer: Admissions are based on merit and the marks obtained in the previous qualifying examination. For most courses, students need to apply online through the official college website during the admission period.

qa_list.question: fee structure
qa_list.answer:
The approximate annual fee for undergraduate courses is as follows:
- B.Sc.: ‚Çπ10,000 - ‚Çπ15,000
- B.A.: ‚Çπ8,000 - ‚Çπ12,000
- B.Com.: ‚Çπ9,000 - ‚Çπ13,000
(Note: Fees are subject to change; check the official college website for exact details.)

qa_list.question: library
qa_list.answer: Kanchrapara College has a well-stocked library with books, journals, and digital resources covering various subjects across Arts, Science, and Commerce streams.

qa_list.question: hostel
qa_list.answer: Currently, Kanchrapara College does not have an on-campus hostel. Students generally arrange accommodation in nearby areas.

qa_list.question: contact
qa_list.answer:
For inquiries, you can contact Kanchrapara College at:
Phone: +91-XXX-XXXXXXX
Email: info@kanchraparacollege.ac.in
Address: Kanchrapara, North 24 Parganas, West Bengal, India.

qa_list.question: website
qa_list.answer: Official website: http://www.kanchraparacollege.ac.in

qa_list.question: affiliation
qa_list.answer: Kanchrapara College is affiliated to West Bengal State University and recognized by the University Grants Commission (UGC).

qa_list.question: events
qa_list.answer: The college organizes annual cultural fests, seminars, workshops, and sports events. Students are encouraged to participate in co-curricular and extra-curricular activities.

qa_list.question: scholarships
qa_list.answer: Meritorious and economically backward students can apply for various scholarships offered by the state government and central government.

qa_list.question: tech fest 2025
qa_list.answer: The Computer Science Department of Kanchrapara College is organizing a Tech Fest on 11th December 2025. The event will feature coding competitions, tech exhibition, photography, cultural programs, tech quizzes, and guest lectures from industry experts.

qa_list.question: marksheet publication
qa_list.answer: Marksheet distribution usually starts within 20-30 days after the publication of semester exam results. Students can collect their marksheets from the college office on the announced dates.

qa_list.question: who is the principal of kanchrapara college?
qa_list.answer: Dr. Pranab Kumar Bera is the Principal of Kanchrapara College. He leads the academic and administrative operations of the institution. Email: info@kpcoll.ac.in.

qa_list.question: history of kanchrapara college?
qa_list.answer: Kanchrapara College was established on 13 November 1972 with only 32 students and one Pre-University course. Over time, it expanded to offer full Arts, Science, and Commerce programs, including postgraduate courses. The college is affiliated with the University of Kalyani, recognized by the UGC, and accredited with a NAAC B+ grade. It now serves thousands of students with well-developed academic and infrastructural facilities.
